Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.addons

Interface MarsAddOn

All Known Implementing Classes:
Actor, AldrichTheDevourer, Bug, Enemies, LordOfCinder, Mimic, Player, Player, Player, Skeleton, Undead, Vendor, YhormTheGiant
public interface MarsAddOn

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default Breathing asMartian()
    Allows upcasting for Actor to a Breathable instance if possible.

  • Method Details

    • asMartian

      default Breathing asMartian()
      Allows upcasting for Actor to a Breathable instance if possible.
      Returns:
      a reference to the current Actor that breathes, or null if this Actor doesn't implement it.
